title: DSP Advertising Campaign Placement
description: Adobe Advertising Cloud DSP Campaign Placement Details.

dsp:placementType.title: Placement Type
dsp:placementType.description: Budget Type indicates how the allocated budget will be spent

dsp:placementStartTime.title: Campaign Placement Start Date and Time
dsp:placementStartTime.description: The date on which a placement starts showing ads (ms since Jan 1, 1970)

dsp:placementEndTime.title: Campaign Placement End Date and Time
dsp:placementEndTime.description: The date after which a placement stops showing ads (ms since Jan 1, 1970).

dsp:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
dsp:campaignId.description: Identifier of the campaign this placement belongs to.

dsp:packageId.title: Package Identifier
dsp:packageId.description: Identifier of the package the placement belongs to.

dsp:siteId.title: Site Identifier
dsp:siteId.description: Identifier of the site where the placement will be shown.

dsp:adIds.title: Ad Identifiers
dsp:adIds.description: List of identifiers for the ads which are linked to this campaign placement.
